## SharedStaticArray class

Typed array representing static memory in wasm.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SharedStaticArray<TCtor extends TTypedArrayCtor> implements ISharedArray<TCtor>, IOnMemoryResize 
```
